alert.note: Alert for Tooele (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 22 at 3:09PM MDT until July 22 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Tooele County in northern Utah... * Until 400 PM MDT * At 309 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 19 miles southwest of Utah Test and Training Range South to 9 miles north of Fish Springs Wildlife Refuge, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Dugway English Village, Dugway Proving Ground Test Range, Utah Test and Training Range South, Knolls, Skull Valley, Clive and Bonneville Salt Flats. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 4 and 68. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
